name: Crunchy Fried Shrimp
author: Kikkoman
summary: The panko bread crumbs give these fried shrimp just the right amount of crunch.
ingredients: 1 pound uncooked jumbo shrimp, peeled and deveined, tails left intact
1 ½ cups Kikkoman Panko Bread Crumbs
directions: Beat eggs in a medium bowl until frothy
Mix flour, salt and pepper in another medium bowl
Dredge shrimp in flour, shake off excess
Dip shrimp into eggs, then press shrimp into Panko; turn shrimp over and press into Panko again to coat both sides
Pour enough oil into heavy large pot to reach depth of 2 inches; heat to 350 degrees F
Working in batches, add shrimp to hot oil; deep-fry until cooked through, about 1 minute
Using tongs transfer shrimp to paper towels to drain
If desired, serve with Kikkoman Tonkatsu Sauce for dipping
